SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.DepartmentID , AA.DepartmentName , AA.ParentID , AA.ManagerID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate
, EE.EmployeeName as ManagerName
FROM dbo.TDepartmentHist AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TEmployee EE WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ManagerID = EE.ID WHERE AA.DepartmentID = #DepartmentID# ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.DepartmentID , AA.DepartmentName , AA.ParentID , AA.ManagerID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate
FROM dbo.TDepartmentHist AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#

SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID

, DepartmentID = #DepartmentID# , DepartmentName = #DepartmentName# , ParentID = #ParentID# , ManagerID = #ManagerID# , StartDate = #StartDate# , EndDate = #EndDate# WHERE ID = #ID#

, AA.DepartmentID , AA.DepartmentName , AA.ParentID , AA.ManagerID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate
FROM dbo.TDepartmentHist AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.DepartmentID = #DepartmentID# AND AA.StartDate = ( SELECT MAX(StartDate) FROM dbo.TDepartmentHist WHERE DepartmentID = #DepartmentID# AND StartDate < #StartDate# )
